trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** de un <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegado se define para la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Puede tener acceso a la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> clase especificando una subrutina denominada **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** en el archivo Global.asax de la aplicación ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento se produce durante la <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> construye una <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> utilizando la identidad de Windows proporcionada por IIS y actual del objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> y lo pasa a la **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto proporcionado a la **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para establecer el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propiedad del elemento actual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> a una personalizada <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Si no especifica un valor para el <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propiedad durante la **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos, las ventanas de identidad proporcionada por IIS se usa como la identidad de la solicitud actual.

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si IIS utiliza la autenticación anónima, la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> objeto se establece en la identidad devuelta por la <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: El **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento es solo se genera cuando la autenticación <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows> y el <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> es un módulo HTTP activo para la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo de código utiliza el **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para establecer el <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propiedad del elemento actual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> a una personalizada <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.
